name: Minna Atsumore! Igo Kyoushitsu
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Even beginners enjoy the fun of Igo! Read the instructions and apply by placing the igo onto the board to have your steps judged. You can learn how to tackle different situations with the large number of cases available. Have fun playing Igo!

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
